mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reservation(reservation_code, book_code, reservation_date) VALUES (#{reservation_code}, #{book_code}, #{reservation_date})
mapper.select: SELECT reservation.reservation_code, reservation.book_code, reservation.reservation_date FROM reservation JOIN book ON reservation.book_code = book.book_code WHERE reservation.reservation_date = #{reservation_date} AND book.site_code = #{site_code};
